website_summaries.verdict: Mid-cut boot with 3M Thinsulate to protect feet in chilly conditions. Heavy-duty design.
pros: In addition to 3M Thinsulate, the boots feature sheepskin-lined insoles for cushioning and warmth
Fine stitching detail with serious curb appeal
Available in black, antique brown, and rustic brown
cons: The added warmth costs a bit more than other styles with different linings, and they could be a bit too warm for some people

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter boots
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for as a wet weather boot. They fit as advertised. I wear 10.5 D and the Australian size 9.5 is perfect. They are beautifully stitched and the leather took a coat of regular black polish and made them look like a pair of dress boots. Go Blunnies!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ruschp

customer_reviews.title: My go to boots in the winter
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are in Australian, I wear a 7.5 and got a 4.5 in these boots. They fit me with any socks with a little toe room left over. I bought the thermal boots. I wear them ALL winter. They keep my toes SO warm, my toes have never got cold and that always my problem in the cold/snow. The only tiny problem I’ve had is one time it rained very hard and I stepped in a deep puddle so water went through the elastic part on the side. But that has never been a problem in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boot for several months and can not say enough good things about them. they are the quality i have always expected from Blundstone and with the thinsulate and furry foot bed that came with them they are warm and comfortable.... I wear them about 12 hrs a day 5 days a week for work and would highly recommend these. for maintenance, i damp cloth them and apply nick wax a couple of times a month to keep them water proof and when they wear out i will buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: jalan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot! Very comfortable, roomy enough for my bunion. Shearling insole is super cozy. Easy on/off. They didn't need any breaking in period, I have been wearing them constantly! I wear them with nicer clothes to work and with jeans on the weekend. I actually had to size down I wear a 10 normally, but needed a 9.5. Love that they are waterproof. I will definitely be buying more blundstone in the future, and also get some for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: I love Blunnies, but then
customer_reviews.text: I love Blunnies, but then, I'm half Australian! I bought my first pair in Hobart, Tasmania while visiting. They are great for dress (I wore them to a concert and sang Handel's Messiah in them tonight!), and I wear Blundstones outside for work. I haven't enjoyed tying laces for years, and I love the comfortable fit and how easily they can be pulled on and off. The price was so good I bought two pair at once: one, this insulated pair, and the other just like it except no insulation. They won't be my last!
customer_reviews.author: Montanalovers

customer_reviews.title: A solid versatile shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size down and it’s perfect. It’s snug enough because I know the leather will stretch a little over time. But this boot is warm, fashionable and keeps water out. I use it primarily for rainy days working in the city.. but i plan to use it for hikes and trips to the snow. I was also sent normal insoles free of charge from Blundstone to use when I don’t need the extra warmth. Love the silhouette. Would consider buying the original!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect! So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! So comfortable. I walk a lot and spend time outdoors in all weather. I often have trouble finding shoes and boots that fit well and look good. These are warm without being too hot. They are lightweight and waterproof. I only wish there was a taller winter version for really snowy weather! In the few weeks I owned these boots, I have worn them in snowy, slushy weather as well as extreme cold and my feet stayed warm and dry every day.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for working full time in a horse barn, they’re fantastic! Nice and warm, and comfortable to walk around in all day. I did go 1/2 size up to accommodate thicker socks since the thinsulate lining makes them a bit more snug than my regular 500 series blunnies. I also ride in them and they aren’t too bulky to fit in my English stirrups. Love them so far and would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AVloeds10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair of Boots
customer_reviews.text: I first heard of Blundstone from a friend of mine when I was living abroad in Korea. 3 years later I now own two pairs! These boots fit the needs for every day purposes. Not only are they beautiful but they come equipped with a thick sole and a soft inside for the perfect comfort level. I have worn these traveling through airports for long periods of time and never had an instance where my feet started to bother me. I would recommend these boots to anyone. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MN22

customer_reviews.title: Very warm, durable, high quality boots. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm, durable, high quality boots. Only reason for not giving 5 stars is that the sizing runs quite large. I did not take the time to return and exchange for a smaller size, so I just went with these and must wear a second pair of socks to fill the space. I ordered a size 11. The inside of the sole is marked as size 12 but the tongue says 11... so maybe a unique manufacturers mistake???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love wearing them. Excellent quality. Great price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FamKay

customer_reviews.title: These bad boys are as comfortable and practical as it gets
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are as comfortable and practical as it gets. They are waterproof, warm, roomy, and comfortable. What else do you want in a shoe?? : ))
customer_reviews.author: Dario De Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband. I have a pair also. We absolutely love them. Essentially no "break in time" as I wore mine for a whole work day the very first time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: V. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit too wide and large knowing it is designed for men and not women, which is good for those with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Bootsy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few different styles . All in 11. Should have order size 10. Still, I own(and have owned ) these boots for years. They are simple and rugged.My favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Valuedretty

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is a little stiff at first, within hours they start to soften up. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Waterman

customer_reviews.title: 9 uk is size 10 us
customer_reviews.text: firstly if you were a 10 in the US you want to buy these boots they're market size 9. fantastic boot in a commercial kitchen waterproof oil resistant the sole doesn't slip at all if maintained they will last years I'm on my third pair highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller than listed.
customer_reviews.text: Could only wear this size with a thin sock. An extra half size bigger would have made it better. Seems one should order a half size bigger than their usual shoe size. Otherwise comfortable to wear. Like the style. Actual product looks just like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by uncomfortable heel seam - Stuck with Blundies 500's instead!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Blundies, so I bought him 2 pair for Christmas this year, a pair of Blundstone 500's (to replace the 2nd pair he's worn out) and, as a treat, this pair of Thermal Blundies. The fit was the same. The look was the same. The sole, inside the boot, is fluffy fleece. Unfortunately, one of the heel seams seemed to lay differently or to protrude where it shouldn't and ended up being too uncomfortable for him to contemplate keeping these boots. He never even got to try them outside where it was cold! I don't know if it was just this pair or if there is something different about this design, but it was not a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Screech400

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect, they look good, there’s much more support than with the Timberlands they replaced...the only problem is that it’s been much warmer than usual so I haven’t needed them! Might have to buy the regular Blundstone’s.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck JP

customer_reviews.title: good looking warm boot
customer_reviews.text: fits as expected and is a comfortable thermally insulated boot.
customer_reviews.author: defran

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 9.5 Womans, received 6.5
customer_reviews.text: I received a boot that was two sizes too small, gave as an early Christmas present, but had to return them to re-order a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Gsanderson001

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfy, waterproof and good tread. What more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S. Terrill

customer_reviews.title: ... I was tight on the instep and was quite annoying. Gradually he disappeared in about ten days
customer_reviews.text: Initially was tight on the instep and was quite annoying. Gradually disappeared in about ten days.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, have been thinking of buying them for my husband for years. He doesn't like that the heel is loose so the back of his foot moves up and down. Returned them, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: What can I say I like Blundstone. Tough and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I like Blundstone. Tough and comfortable, indestructible, and I put them to the test almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite boot
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfy as hell. Did not come with regular insoles, just sheepskin ones. Not mad about it, just curious what I’d get.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots I wear them everyday. Had to get thermals bc I work in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Erynn Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Fit is too large
customer_reviews.text: Fit is too large. Love the boots and wore for a week, but would return for a smaller size if I could... but threw the packaging away :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E.

customer_reviews.title: Great fleece-lined boots for all weather.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my step-son to wear in Boston. He's very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Overall, pretty good quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Might get a blister or two for the first time wearing these but after few days it gets pretty comfy
customer_reviews.author: Jae Park

customer_reviews.title: Runs small; difficult to slip in and out of
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a number of these boots, trying to get the sizing right. They run quite small; I've sized up by more than 1 shoe size to find a pair that finally fits. I eventually sent them back (even after getting the proper fit) as they are very difficult to slip in and out of. The stretchy side panel doesn't extend far down and is cut quite narrow -- there doesn't seem to be enough elastic to allow the instep & upper heel to separate easily. Ended up trading in for a pair of Redbacks that are excellent in all ways though only available in brown. If you're looking for an easy on/off boot I'd go for those instead.
customer_reviews.author: alfadog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect three season boots. Comfortable, attractive, warm and waterproof. I'm never taking them off till June.
customer_reviews.author: KaiKai

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Just what I had hoped for in these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: A hit with my college-age stepson
customer_reviews.text: My stepson goes to school in Montreal and has picked up on European fashion trends. As a result, we have never been able to convince him to wear sensible, sturdy boots to keep his feet warm. This Christmas, he picked these boots out on his own, so I was very happy to oblige. I didn't expect them to arrive by December 25 based on the projected delivery date, but they got here very quickly. They fit him well and are apparently a nice blend of form and function for a 22-year-old guy.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great, very light weight. They're nicely made and seem built to last for years. Amazon also had the least expensive (with free shipping) BL566's I found on the web.
customer_reviews.author: mdjones

customer_reviews.title: Blundlove
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction ; leather is of great quality; great for flat footer. Would buy again. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: AlmaL2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably comfortable. Great fit, warm, water proof and they look good too
customer_reviews.author: mbsaltzman

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way they feel and look great winter boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run big in the US.
customer_reviews.text: Blundstone makes great boots. I usually wear a US 12. Clearly I need 11.5s in this case. These are on the way back, but looking forward to getting the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is definitely weird. Im usually a 12US/11UK and find that the 10.5 fits perfect. These boots are great for the winter (own 2 pair). Very light and comfortable, easy on and off. The thinsulate and wool footbed are surprisingly warm. Wore my first pair all winter last year and my never got wet and stayed fairly warm (depending on how long outside). They arent overly dressy and they arent too casual, great medium to wear with multiple outfits. I love em
customer_reviews.author: ROC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Been wearing blunnies for 15 years. Hard to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but just runs a bit small. I had to order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Warm Durable and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman, 5'6" and 130lbs. I bought a size 6 and I'm usually an 8. I chose these to help me keep warm in Connecticut and I'm so happy I did. My feet are always super toasty which keeps the rest of my body warmer. They're incredibly durable too. They weigh a little heavier than an average shoe and they're a bit bulkier of course. So be prepared when you're looking in the mirror. But if you're ok with a decently fashionable shoe and toasty warm feet then you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is my perfect size and I have a normal width
customer_reviews.text: Made very well, but too large. I ordered an 8/12, which is my perfect size and I have a normal width, but it felt a 1/2 size too large and a bit wide as well. It looked like a man's shoe on a woman's foot on so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured in Vietnam. Weird and bulky. I used to love the 500s
customer_reviews.text: Made in Vietnam, not Australia like they used to be. I owned pairs of 500s, but stopped buying them after a defective pair. The soles crumbled. I contacted Blundstone, they offered to replace them. It never received a replacement. I needed a sturdy pair of boots for work, figured I'd try them out again. They're warm alright, but the internal seams around the ankle are uncomfortable. The Vietnam manufacturing is real disappointment, I would like to support a non communist factory. It wasn't clearly stated on Amazon. They are on the bulky side vs the classic 500s
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Jern

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel like giant clod hoppers other wise they are solid.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot.. Ride the bike with it.. all day comfort.
customer_reviews.author: 47Knuckle

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to hear or should I say read about the ...
customer_reviews.text: You may not want to post. I remember the unique thing about Blunnies is there were hand sewn in Tasmania. It made them sepcial now they are made in another country. I was disappointed to hear or should I say read about the change. My old ones were made in Tasmania but the sole fell off after several years of wear. I am hanging onto them after hearing the news about Blunnies. I did have to take out the sheep fleece insole in order for them to fit. I wear a size 5 but because of insole they were too tight.
customer_reviews.author: ewelambae

customer_reviews.title: Thought they might be a little tight at first, ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought they might be a little tight at first, but when I replaced the winter fuzzy inserts with some regular ones, had plenty of room for my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: RESEARCH THE SIZE YOU NEED FOR U.S
customer_reviews.text: Once again. Researched for minutes for the US/Womens size for 9 1⁄2. 4th pair I’ve returned. Had to go local to find right size. And they don’t have the thermal blunnies I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: grateful

customer_reviews.title: These are epic
customer_reviews.text: I for these at a wedding and at the barn this week pretty darn perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed: ( clearly ordered a men's size 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed:( clearly ordered a men's size 12 us. And received an 11uk size. This was supposed to be a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Alleine Anselmo

product_meta.title: Blundstone Thermal Series
product_meta.description: Blundstone has been making sturdy and unique boots in Tasmania, Australia, since 1870. The family-owned company has maintained the quality, integrity and authenticity of their products for over 130 years. Blundstone boots are no-nonsense, go-anywhere, do-anything legends. Their durability is phenomenal. In these days of disposability, it's reassuring to know that with proper care, it's not uncommon for your Blundstone's to last for years.
